home.SEO_TITLE: Astro - The Future of Static Sites
home.SEO_DESCRIPTION: Astro is a new kind of static site builder that delivers lightning-fast performance and modern developer productivity. It's the first framework that's both built with your favorite JavaScript framework and generates a fully static site that can deploy to any CDN.
